Name: Shervanis Caliphate
Description: The Caliphate is ruled by Omar Shervanis, who rose to be the leader of the most powerful of the city-states and unify all of Astrokaszy under a single government in 3001. Ruling from Shervanis City, the caliph is known to be extremely cunning but also very sadistic and has allowed ComStar to establish an HPG compound on Astrokaszy.
ReputationStatements: His Highness, the Enlightened Caliph Omar Servanis has a mission for you, mercenary.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. We obviously placed our faith in the right mercenary company. We'll let you know if we have any other work for you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed you couldn't complete the contract, but at least you gave it your best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatements: For somebody who came so highly recommended, you let us down pretty hard. Thanks for nothing, I guess.
